title: YouTuber KSI faces pump-and-dump allegations from ZachXBT and Coffeezilla
description:
KSI claimed that every time he tweeted something, the opposite would occur, and that was why he decided to “tweet the opposite” of what he was doing.

YouTube star Olajide Olayinka Williams Olatunji, more commonly known as “KSI,” faces pump-and-dump allegations from crypto investigators ZachXBT and Coffeezilla after reopening his old crypto-focused X account. 

On Feb. 14, KSI revived his old account on X, where he used to talk about crypto token investments. The internet celebrity shared a post, testing the waters on the crypto-focused account with about 371,000 followers.

A few hours later, crypto investigator ZachXBT commented on KSI’s post, saying that the YouTuber would start “sharing garbage again.” The crypto detective followed up his reply by sharing a screenshot of KSI posting about his investment in the watch-to-earn project XCAD Network (XCAD). This was paired with another screen grab of KSI’s crypto wallet dumping $850,000 in XCAD tokens

Read more

title: PolyOne Announces Exclusive NFT Drop with Visionary Digital Artist Necrofear
description: PolyOne, the groundbreaking arts and entertainment NFT platform, is thrilled to announce an exclusive NFT drop by pioneering 2D/3D artist Necrofear FX.  This collaboration marks a significant milestone that underscores PolyOne’s mission to harness blockchain technology and the creator economy for the greater good, bringing a unique blend of classical, gothic-dark aesthetics and modern digital artistry which highlights this unique point of inflection in our history of civilization.

title: John Deaton eyes, senate run against Elizabeth Warren
description: In a move that could significantly impact the political landscape of Massachusetts, John Deaton, a prominent attorney within the digital asset industry, is reportedly contemplating a run as a Republican candidate against incumbent Senator Elizabeth Warren. title: TRON Unveils Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution with Strategic Road Map
description:

TRON is set to launch its Bitcoin Layer 2 solution, aiming to bridge the gap between TRON’s extensive network.
